source:
%%sql
MERGE INTO crm_sanctioneddb.dim_opportunity AS target
USING (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        O.opportunityid AS Opportunity_id_nk,
        '' AS Opportunity_desc_nk,
        O.new_technocalsectorsname AS Primary_Practice,
        O.new_chemonicsrbuentity AS Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        O.new_debrief AS Debrief_Id_nk,
        O.new_parentiqc AS IQC_framework_id_nk,
        O.new_primarycountry AS Primary_Location_Country_Key,
        O.chem_missionorganizationissuingcontract AS Account_Id_nk,
        O.new_anticipatedsoltype AS Solicitation_type_id_nk,
        O.new_proposalduedate AS Proposal_Due_Date,
        COALESCE(O.estimatedvalue_base, 0.0) AS Estimated_value,
        OM_new_stage.LocalizedLabel AS Stage,
        COALESCE(O.new_iqcceilingcurrency_base, 0.0) AS IQC_Ceiling,
        O.chem_iqcawardtype AS IQC_Award_Type,
        CAST(O.chem_pendingwin AS INT) AS Pending_Win,
        O.new_role1 AS Role,
        O.new_comprangeduedate AS Comp_Range_Due_Date,
        OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1.LocalizedLabel AS Probability_of_Bidding,
        O.finaldecisiondate AS Award_Date,
        A.name AS Organization_Full_Name,
        GOM_new_contracttype.LocalizedLabel AS Contract_Type,
        OM_new_solicitationtype.LocalizedLabel AS Solicitation_Type,
        O.new_solicitationlongname AS Solicitation_Short_Name,
        O.name AS Solicitation_Full_Name,
        O.new_anticipatedsoltype AS Anticipated_Sol_Type,
        O.new_releasedate AS Solicitation_Release_Date,
        'https://chemonics.crm.dynamics.com/main.aspx?appid=6a416dab-0787-e811-a95c-000d3a3af855&pagetype=entityrecord&etn=opportunity&id=' || O.opportunityid AS CRM_URL,
        HASH(
            O.opportunityid, O.new_technocalsectorsname, O.new_chemonicsrbuentity, O.new_debrief, O.new_parentiqc, O.new_primarycountry, O.chem_missionorganizationissuingcontract, O.new_anticipatedsoltype, O.new_proposalduedate, O.estimatedvalue_base,
            OM_new_stage.LocalizedLabel,
            O.new_iqcceilingcurrency_base, O.chem_iqcawardtype, O.chem_pendingwin, O.new_role1, O.new_comprangeduedate,
            OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1.LocalizedLabel,
            O.finaldecisiondate, A.name,
            GOM_new_contracttype.LocalizedLabel,
            OM_new_solicitationtype.LocalizedLabel,
            O.new_solicitationlongname, O.name, O.new_anticipatedsoltype, O.new_releasedate
        ) AS Audit_Hash_Cd,
        O.IsActive,
        CAST('2020-01-01' AS DATE) AS effective_start_date,
        CAST('9999-12-31' AS DATE) AS effective_end_date,
        current_date() AS Date_Created,
        current_date() AS Date_Updated_Last,
        current_user() AS Created_By,
        current_user() AS Updated_By
    FROM crm_query.opportunity AS O
    LEFT JOIN crm_query.account AS A ON A.accountid = O.new_prime AND A.IsActive = 1
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM dataverse_chemonicscrm_chemonics.OptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_stage'
    ) AS OM_new_stage ON O.new_stage = OM_new_stage.Option
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM dataverse_chemonicscrm_chemonics.OptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1'
    ) AS OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1 ON O.new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1 = OM_new_determinecertaintyofsoliciationrelease1.Option
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM dataverse_chemonicscrm_chemonics.OptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_solicitationtype'
    ) AS OM_new_solicitationtype ON O.new_solicitationtype = OM_new_solicitationtype.Option
    LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT Option, LocalizedLabel
        FROM dataverse_chemonicscrm_chemonics.GlobalOptionsetMetadata
        WHERE EntityName = 'opportunity' AND OptionSetName = 'new_contracttype'
    ) AS GOM_new_contracttype ON O.new_contracttype = GOM_new_contracttype.Option
    WHERE O.IsActive = 1 AND O.opportunityid IS NOT NULL
) AS source
ON target.Opportunity_id_nk = source.Opportunity_id_nk and target.isActive=1
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET 
        target.effective_end_date = current_date(),
        target.IsActive = 0
WHEN NOT MATCHED BY TARGET THEN
    INSERT (
        Opportunity_id_nk,
        Opportunity_desc_nk,
        Primary_Practice,
        Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        Debrief_Id_nk,
        IQC_framework_id_nk,
        Primary_Location_Country_Key,
        Account_Id_nk,
        Solicitation_type_id_nk,
        Proposal_Due_Date,
        Estimated_value,
        Stage,
        IQC_Ceiling,
        IQC_Award_Type,
        Pending_Win,
        Role,
        Comp_Range_Due_Date,
        Probability_of_Bidding,
        Award_Date,
        Organization_Full_Name,
        Contract_Type,
        Solicitation_Type,
        Solicitation_Short_Name,
        Solicitation_Full_Name,
        Anticipated_Sol_Type,
        Solicitation_Release_Date,
        CRM_URL,
        Audit_Hash_Cd,
        IsActive,
        effective_start_date,
        effective_end_date,
        Date_Created,
        Date_Updated_Last,
        Created_By,
        Updated_By
    ) VALUES (
        source.Opportunity_id_nk,
        source.Opportunity_desc_nk,
        source.Primary_Practice,
        source.Business_Unit_Id_nk,
        source.Debrief_Id_nk,
        source.IQC_framework_id_nk,
        source.Primary_Location_Country_Key,
        source.Account_Id_nk,
        source.Solicitation_type_id_nk,
        source.Proposal_Due_Date,
        source.Estimated_value,
        source.Stage,
        source.IQC_Ceiling,
        source.IQC_Award_Type,
        source.Pending_Win,
        source.Role,
        source.Comp_Range_Due_Date,
        source.Probability_of_Bidding,
        source.Award_Date,
        source.Organization_Full_Name,
        source.Contract_Type,
        source.Solicitation_Type,
        source.Solicitation_Short_Name,
        source.Solicitation_Full_Name,
        source.Anticipated_Sol_Type,
        source.Solicitation_Release_Date,
        source.CRM_URL,
        source.Audit_Hash_Cd,
        source.IsActive,
        source.effective_start_date,
        source.effective_end_date,
        source.Date_Created,
        source.Date_Updated_Last,
        source.Created_By,
        source.Updated_By
    );
